#############################################################################

#

# Generated by Smurf Config Editor made by tanish2k09
#
# Smurf kernel by XDA Senior Member @pappschlumpf
#############################################################################
#
# ----- How to Guide ------
#
# For each Option you will find multiple lines with all available values
# Simply remove the # in front of the option you want to apply
# and add # in front of all remaining options in that category
#
# The settings are ordered in this order:
# - Battery friendy (top)
# - Performance friendly (bottom)
#############################################################################
